page.title: 19A Day in the Life of Andrew
page.content: On Wednesday I stayed in bed till quarter past eight.At eighteen minutes past I went downstairs to have my breakfast of cornflakes, then I went to the toilet and washed, at halfpast eight I got dressed and went downstairs, I watched T.V.am for half an hour and then had a rush to get to school.I got to school and sat down,then Mr Jones said we would have an assembly with Mrs Thorpe and a Jamaican girl, we had a story and some hymns.We came back to the class,glad that assembly was over we were going on a trip around the farms in a certain area(for the Domesday Project). We went to Manor farm ,Brook farm and Haydon Wick farm.We had maps and pencils,we jotted down information on a piece of writing paper and drew in the church and the new houses on a piece of paper to
